definition: relating to vibrations that occur as a result of vibrations in a nearby body
details:
adjective
- relating to vibrations that occur as a result of vibrations in a nearby body
= example: relating to vibrations that occur as a result of vibrations in a nearby body
= synonyms: harmonic
- showing or motivated by sympathy and understanding and generosity
= synonyms: charitable
- having similar disposition and tastes
= example: having similar disposition and tastes
- expressing or feeling or resulting from sympathy or compassion or friendly fellow feelings
- (of characters in literature or drama) evoking empathic or sympathetic feelings
= example: (of characters in literature or drama) evoking empathic or sympathetic feelings
= synonyms: appealing
- of or relating to the sympathetic nervous system
= example: of or relating to the sympathetic nervous system
